page.title: 05Girls' clothes of the 80's
page.content: For children of our age the most fashionable clothes shop is Top Shop. They sell clothes made of crinkly materials. The garments look as though they need ironing. You can buy ski-pants, jump-suits, roll-up trousers, loose trousers and body warmers. You wear snoods around your neck or on your head. Bat-wing jumpers are enormous and polo necks are coming back into fashion. Rock and roll dresses have stiff petticoats to make them stand out. Some of the favourites for winter are leg warmers, luminous socks and finger gloves. Colours for the winter are black, grey, red and bright colours. For the summer there are mostly pastel shades.{ {
